SELECT A.TRANSACTIONKEY,A.HOST_CUST_ID,A.TX_NO,A.ORGANKEY,A.TX_DT,A.ACCT_NUM,A.PARTY_ID,A.DEBIT_CREDIT, A.AMT,A.CNY_AMT,A.CASH_TRANS_FLAG,A.VOUCHER_NO,A.PARTY_CHN_NAME,A.CURRENCY_CD FROM T47_TRANSACTION_UB A
A.tx_no = #tx_no#
A.HOST_CUST_ID = #host_cust_id#
A.CNY_AMT >= #amt_start#
A.CNY_AMT <= #amt_end#
A.TX_DT >= #tx_dt:DATE#
A.TX_DT <= #tx_dtEnd:DATE#
A.ORGANKEY = #organkey#
A.ORGANKEY IN ($organkeystr$)
A.TRANSACTIONKEY = #transactionkey#
A.ACCT_NUM = #acct_num#
A.PARTY_ID = #party_id#
A.CASH_TRANS_FLAG = #cash_trans_flag#
A.DEBIT_CREDIT = #debit_credit#
A.VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#
A.VALIDATE_IND2 = #validate_ind#
(A.VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind# OR A.VALIDATE_IND2 = #validate_ind#)
A.HANDLE_STATUS_CD = #handle_status_cd#
A.PARTY_CLASS_CD = #party_class_cd_search#
A.CURR_CD = #curr_cd#
A.RE_IND = #re_ind#
A.ADDTIONAL = #addtional#
ORDER BY A.TX_DT DESC,A.ADDTIONAL ASC,A.ORGANKEY ASC,A.TX_NO ASC
ORDER BY A.TX_DT
ORDER BY A.PARTY_ID
ORDER BY A.ACCT_NUM
ORDER BY A.ORGANKEY
ORDER BY A.TELLER
ORDER BY A.TX_CD
ORDER BY A.AMT
ORDER BY A.ADDTIONAL
,A.TX_DT DESC,A.TX_NO ASC
DESC
,A.TX_DT DESC,A.TX_NO ASC

SELECT count(*) FROM T47_TRANSACTION_UB A

SELECT A.TRANSACTIONKEY,A.HOST_CUST_ID,A.TX_NO,A.ORGANKEY,A.TX_DT,A.ACCT_NUM,A.PARTY_ID,A.DEBIT_CREDIT, A.AMT,A.CASH_TRANS_FLAG,A.VOUCHER_NO,A.PARTY_CHN_NAME,A.CURRENCY_CD,A.CB_TX_CD FROM T47_TRANSACTION_UC A WHERE A.HANDLE_STATUS_CD = '1'
A.tx_no = #tx_no#
A.HOST_CUST_ID = #host_cust_id#
A.CNY_AMT >= #amt_start#
A.CNY_AMT <= #amt_end#
A.TX_DT >= #tx_dt:DATE#
A.TX_DT <= #tx_dtEnd:DATE#
A.TX_DT >= #tx_today:DATE#
A.ORGANKEY = #organkey#
A.ORGANKEY IN ($organkeystr$)
A.TRANSACTIONKEY = #transactionkey#
A.ACCT_NUM = #acct_num#
A.PARTY_ID = #party_id#
A.CASH_TRANS_FLAG = #cash_trans_flag#
A.DEBIT_CREDIT = #debit_credit#
A.CB_TX_CD = #cb_tx_cd#
A.TELLER = #teller#
A.VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind#
A.VALIDATE_IND2 = #validate_ind#
A.IS_RECORDFLAG = '1'
(A.VALIDATE_IND = #validate_ind# OR A.VALIDATE_IND2 = #validate_ind#
A.IS_RECORDFLAG = '1'
)
A.PARTY_CLASS_CD = #party_class_cd_search#
A.CURR_CD = #curr_cd#
A.RECORD_ENDDATE >= #starttime:DATE#
A.RECORD_ENDDATE <= #starttime2:DATE#
A.IS_RECORDFLAG = #is_recordflag#
ORDER BY A.TX_DT DESC,A.TX_NO ASC
ORDER BY A.TX_DT
ORDER BY A.PARTY_ID
ORDER BY A.ACCT_NUM
ORDER BY A.ORGANKEY
ORDER BY A.TELLER
ORDER BY A.TX_CD
ORDER BY A.AMT
ORDER BY A.ADDTIONAL
,A.TX_DT DESC,A.TX_NO ASC
DESC
,A.TX_DT DESC,A.TX_NO ASC

INSERT INTO T47_TRANSACTION( TRANSACTIONKEY,CB_PK,TX_NO,VOUCHER_NO,ORGANKEY,TX_DT,DT_TIME,ACCT_NUM,PARTY_ID,PARTY_CLASS_CD,TX_CD, CB_TX_CD,BUS_TYPE_CD,TX_TYPE_CD,DEBIT_CREDIT,RECEIVE_PAY_CD,SUBJECTNO,CURRENCY_CD,CURR_CD,AMT,CNY_AMT, USD_AMT,CASH_TRANS_FLAG,REMIT_TYPE_CD,DES,OVERAREA_IND,SETTLE_TYPE_CD,USE_DES,OPP_SYS_ID,OPP_ISPARTY, OPP_AREA,OPP_ORGAN_TYPE,OPP_ORGANKEY,OPP_ORGANNAME,OPP_PARTY_ID,OPP_NAME,OPP_ACCT_NUM,OPP_ACCT_TYPE_CD, OPP_CARD_TYPE,OPP_CARD_NO,OPP_PARTY_CLASS_CD,CANCEL_IND,AMT_CD,BATCH_IND,TELLER,RE_IND,HANDLE_STATUS_CD,PARTY_CHN_NAME, ADDTIONAL,TX_DIRECT,TOKEN_NO,HOST_CUST_ID,CHANNEL,CAL_IND,OPP_COUNTRY,TSCTKEY,TX_GO_COUNTRY, TX_GO_AREA,TX_OCCUR_COUNTRY,TX_OCCUR_AREA,AGENT_NAME,AGENT_CARD_TYPE,AGENT_CARD_NO,AGENT_COUNTRY,ORG_TRANS_RELA, CASH_IND,OPP_PBC_PARTY_CLASS_CD,OPP_OFF_SHORE_IND,VALIDATE_IND,VALIDATE_IND2,TEMP1,RE_DT ) VALUES( #transactionkey#,#cb_pk#,#tx_no#,#voucher_no#,#organkey#,#tx_dt#,#dt_time#,#acct_num#,#party_id#,#party_class_cd#,#tx_cd#, #cb_tx_cd#,#bus_type_cd#,#tx_type_cd#,#debit_credit#,#receive_pay_cd#,#subjectno#,#currency_cd#,#curr_cd#,#amt#,#cny_amt#, #usd_amt#,#cash_trans_flag#,#remit_type_cd#,#des#,#overarea_ind#,#settle_type_cd#,#use_des#,#opp_sys_id#,#opp_isparty#, #opp_area#,#opp_organ_type#,#opp_organkey#,#opp_organname#,#opp_party_id#,#opp_name#,#opp_acct_num#,#opp_acct_type_cd#, #opp_card_type#,#opp_card_no#,#opp_party_class_cd#,#cancel_ind#,#amt_cd#,#batch_ind#,#teller#,#re_ind#,#handle_status_cd#,#party_chn_name#, #addtional#,#tx_direct#,#token_no#,#host_cust_id#,#channel#,#cal_ind#,#opp_country#,#tsctkey#,#tx_go_country#, #tx_go_area#,#tx_occur_country#,#tx_occur_area#,#agent_name#,#agent_card_type#,#agent_card_no#,#agent_country#,#org_trans_rela#, #cash_ind#,#opp_pbc_party_class_cd#,#opp_off_shore_ind#,#validate_ind#,#validate_ind2#,#txt#,#re_dt# )

INSERT INTO T47_ACCT_UC(ACCT_NUM, PARTY_ID, AML_ACCT_TYPE_CD, OPEN_DT, CLOSE_DT,acct_from,OP_ORG_NUM) SELECT A.ACCT_NUM,A.CUSTOMER_ID,A.AML_ACCT_TYPE_CD,A.OPEN_DT,A.CLOSE_DT ,A.acct_from,A.OP_ORG_NUM FROM T47_AGREEMENT A WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'A' FROM T47_ACCT_UC UC WHERE UC.ACCT_NUM=A.ACCT_NUM) AND A.ACCT_NUM in($value$)

T47_TRANSACTION_UC A WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM T07_CASE_TRANSACTION B WHERE B.TRANSACTIONKEY = A.TRANSACTIONKEY AND B.APPLICATION_NUM=#application_num# )
T47_TRANSACTION_UH A, WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM T07_CASE_TRANSACTION_UH B WHERE B.TRANSACTIONKEY = A.TRANSACTIONKEY AND B.APPLICATION_NUM=#application_num# )
T47_TRANSACTION_UC A, WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM T07_CASE_TRANSACTION B WHERE B.TRANSACTIONKEY = A.TRANSACTIONKEY AND B.APPLICATION_NUM=#application_num# )

( A.VALIDATE_IND2='0' OR A.VALIDATE_IND2='2')
A.VALIDATE_IND= #validate_ind#
A.VALIDATE_IND2= #validate_ind#

A.CNY_AMT >= #amt_start#

A.TX_DT <= #tx_dtEnd:DATE#
